introduction.paragraph1: You might be wondering, 'Why would anyone bother writing a blog?'. I often ask myself the same question. Besides, I do ask this question also when I see other people's blogs as well.
introduction.paragraph2: As the founder of an artificial intelligence start-up, my answer lies in a personal journey to understand the essence of learning and expression. I've found it fascinating that writing—just jotting thoughts down, not necessarily in a structured way—helps me organize my mind, feel more grounded, and even heal emotionally.
introduction.paragraph3: I began this journey with a simple insight: even in an age where infinite information and connections are just a prompt away thanks to the Large Language Models, humans still have a unique ability to perceive meaning and recognize patterns in a deeply personal way.
introduction.paragraph4: Motivated by this insight—and to support both my reflective process and daily use of AI—I decided to create a kind of personal archive.
